channel.title: CVE Feed for ghostscript -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ghostscript -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-14869|2024-08-05T00:26:39.155Z -- ghostscript -- ghostscript
item.description: A flaw was found in all versions of ghostscript 9.x before 9.50, where the `.charkeys` procedure, where it did not properly secure its privileged calls, enabling scripts to bypass `-dSAFER` restrictions. An attacker could abuse this flaw by creating a specially crafted PostScript file that could escalate privileges within the Ghostscript and access files outside of restricted areas or execute commands.
